p: All results obtained on the lipid emulsion stability after mixing drugs with the PN admixture are summarized in Tables 5 and 6. None of the PN admixtures showed signs of reduced emulsion stability after mixing with any of the drugs in any of the mixed concentrations. Compared with the unmixed controls (Table 4), all physical parameters remained in the same order of magnitude and all were well below the acceptance criteria to be stable and safe.
